title: Latin America Demand Generation Senior Analyst
summary: Join the Apple Latin America Sales Finance organization and make a positive impact on a company that is known for its impressive lineup of products...
description: The position reports to Latin America Demand Generation Controller and requires extensive financial modeling, critical thinking, market analytics...
key_qualifications: At least 5+ years of experience in a fast paced, high growth environment in a Sales Finance role (or similar) with financial modeling, market analytics, competitive assessment, reporting and consolidation. Expertise in Excel. Experience in SQL/Tableau. Proficiency in English.
preferred_qualifications: Ability to analyze information objectively and make reasoned judgment aligned with strategic goals. Ability to communicate effectively both written and verbal. Capacity to collaborate with a diverse group of partners and build partnerships to drive positive business results. Business, Finance, Accounting or Engineering Degree. MBA in a related field. Spanish and Portuguese proficiency.
